mySkills.name: Backstab
mySkills.description: Stabs the enemy in the back, dealing extra damage.

mySkills.name: Charge
mySkills.description: Charges at the enemy, dealing damage and stunning them.

mySkills.name: Fireball
mySkills.description: Launches a fireball at the enemy, dealing damage over time.

mySkills.name: Ice Bolt
mySkills.description: Fires a bolt of ice at the enemy, slowing them down.

mySkills.name: Thunderstorm
mySkills.description: Summons a thunderstorm to strike the enemy, dealing damage and stunning them.

mySkills.name: Heal
mySkills.description: Restores health to the caster or an ally.

mySkills.name: Invisibility
mySkills.description: Makes the caster invisible, allowing them to avoid attacks.
